plugins.name: Text Visual Alignment
plugins.description:
When working with typography in Figma you often have to manually move text layers and align them to the grid or ruler. This happens because of glyph sidebearings which create huge “white holes”. It gets even worse if you have two text layers of different sizes. In this case the “holes” become much more visible.


Our plugin compensates for the sidebearings and works with layers in two ways. Strict Alignment moves the text layer to the first visible pixel. It can be useful when you work with a group of single-line text layers. Optically Correct Alignment moves the layer to the sidebearing value of a straight glyph stem (Latin n/u, Cyrillic н). You can use this option for multi-line layers, especially when the text is set in small sizes.
plugins.tagline: Quickly compensate for sidebearings in text layers to align them perfectly

plugins.name: Selection Renamer
plugins.description:
Selection Renamer is designed to streamline your design process. Select a text layer, and the plugin will rename the top-level frame or section that the text resides in, using the content of the selected text. This makes renaming a quick and effortless task, ultimately saving you time and enhancing your workflow.


Instructions

  • Select text within a frame or a section
  • Hit ‘Run’ on the plugin
  • Top level section or frame name renames to content from text selection.


Pro-Tip: You can select text layers contained in different sections or frames to bulk rename your frames or sections.


Additional links/resources

plugins.name: Maximum Override
plugins.description:
Compare objects to see what's different, then copy and paste the changes. Compare instances to their default main component and copy and paste the overrides.


Features

1. Copy and paste overrides between symbols


Two of Figma's greatest strengths are:


a. Overriding colors, text, and other properties on component instances, and

b. Swapping out instances of components, such as a icons or states.


But when you swap an instance, you lose all the overrides you've made, including changes to nested instances within a parent component.


Maximum Override allows you to copy your overrides, swap out an instance, and then paste the overrides back onto the new instance, to retain all of your changes. This includes nested instances that you've swapped with a different component.


2. Compare properties between objects


Maximum Override also allows you to select any two nodes on the stage and compare them against each other to see what's different. (In software, this is known as a "diff".) You can then copy the changes from object A to object B, or vice-versa. If you select a single instance, Maximum Override will compare it against its own main component.


------------


Bugs? Suggestions? Contributions? See the open-source project at https://github.com/CrookedGrin/maximum-override.

plugins.name: Snapattern - Seamless pattern generator
plugins.description:
Snappattern - Turn anything into dynamic patterns


Snapattern lets you transform any layer — shapes, text, icons, images, frames — into generative, customisable patterns inside Figma. With simple, powerful controls, you can create visually stunning repeated patterns for backgrounds, branding, illustrations, and more in just a few clicks.


Playground File : This file has 50 patterns generated using this plugin and can be used for background, abstracts arts and social media visuals.


Key Features :


  1. Any Shapes, text layers, images, icons, groups, and frames - anything can be selected and be generated as a pattern.
  2. Supports Repeat, grid based patterns.
  3. Ability to generate patterns based on components/instances.
  4. Adjust opacity for layering effects
  5. Add rotation for circular effects
  6. Adjust directions for patterns
  7. Scale elements to add depth and variations.


Pricing :


Free : Up to 10 free pattern generations to explore and test the plugin.

Premium : Unlimited pattern generations at a price of coffee.


Future :


Instance based pattern generations planned for now - Shipped

accepted.name: Briston
accepted.description: Designer | Student | webflow

plugins.tagline: Turn anything into generative patterns

plugins.name: Mondrian Grid
plugins.description:
Mondrian Grid Generator is a Figma plugin designed to facilitate the creation of Mondrian-style geometric patterns.


It offers a set of controls for users to specify parameters such as grid levels, stroke thickness, and the ratio of cell division, enabling a wide range of design possibilities. The plugin produces a randomized, unique output within the user-specified constraints. It's particularly useful for designers seeking to quickly generate abstract, geometrically-structured artwork or backgrounds, in line with Mondrian's distinctive style, directly within their Figma projects.


How to Use


To use the plugin, select a frame and set the parameters. Increasing the levels parameter increases the number of cells in the grid. Stroke controls the thickness of the stroke and the split ratio slider lets you define how even you want the randomized cell division to occur.


Choosing a levels value of 2 can create distinct grids to use in presentation slides.


NOTE: Select an empty frame to run the plugin as it will remove all children objects present in the frame

accepted.name: Abhishek Shankar
accepted.description: Product Designer & Tinkerer

plugins.tagline: Create abstract, geometric Mondrian-style grids with user-set parameters.

plugins.name: Restaurant Generator
plugins.description:
Restaurant generator allows you to populate your components with realistic, matching restaurant data. Simply name each of the layers by their supported data types and instant generate content for any component, frame, group, or layer. Supports multi-select and a hard coded set of restaurant data, but more to come!


For this to properly work, you need to name the field inside a component or group with the following options:

[data-name], [data-cuisine], [data-address], [data-cover]

plugins.name: Style Dictionary to Variables
plugins.description:
Import your Style Dictionary JSON file as Figma variables and variable aliases. Supports updating existing token collections.


Visit the GitHub repo for example input files.


Limitations

  • Does not support boolean
  • JSON file must be in Style Dictionary CTI format
  • Only 1 JSON file and token type at a time


Instructions

  1. Select import mode. If you select the "Update existing" import mode, the plugin will try to update the collection with a name matching what is defined as part of the group field on a token property. Tokens will be replaced based on their names as well.
  2. Drop or select Style Dictionary JSON file
  3. Variables should be created in “Local variables”


Support

Please open an issue on the GitHub repo if you have any questions or feedback!

accepted.name: Joseph Le
accepted.description: Design Engineer @ Persona

plugins.tagline: Import Style Dictionary JSON as Figma Variables

plugins.name: Scan Script
plugins.description:
English version is below.



🔌 どんなプラグイン？


Scan Scriptは、画像データのテキストを判別してテキストデータを出力するプラグインです。


デザイン作業を行っていると、画像データで作業指示が来ることありますよね。そして、画像内のテキストをそのまま使いたいけど、コピー＆ペーストできないから手で打ち込んでミスが無いか念入りに確認することがないでしょうか？

そんなときに、このプラグインを利用すれば、画像データをテキストデータに変換することができます。



🔧 使い方


画像を1枚選択して「読取」を押して、少し待つと画像内のテキストデータが出力されます。



⏱️ こんなときにおすすめ


画像データからテキストデータに変換できます。言語選択が不要で読取りも高精度です！


ぜひ、このプラグインを利用して作業効率を上げ、クリエイティブな作品を作り上げてください。

Feedback Flowは、デスクワークブランド「NERY」が提供するプラグイン#100シリーズの第7弾になります！



📝 プラグイン機能のご要望・ご意見をお聞かせください


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 NERYとは？


NERYは、FigmaとChromeのプラグインを開発・提供するデスクワークブランドです。



🚀 プラグイン#100シリーズとは？


プラグイン#100シリーズは、FigmaとGoogle Chromeのユーザー向けに、100個のプラグインをリリースするプロジェクトです。


このプロジェクトでは、クリエイターのニーズに応じたプラグインを開発し、デザイン作業をより便利かつ効率的に行えるようにサポートします。


プロジェクトは、企画から開発まですべてを行うのではなく、途中段階のものを皆様にお見せし、フィードバックをいただくことで、プラグインの機能拡充や新たな製品開発につなげます。


皆様の声がプラグインの開発に反映されることで、より使いやすく、より魅力的なFigmaとChromeを実現するために、皆様のご支援をお願いいたします。



🏢 開発会社


株式会社アジケ

https://ajike.co.jp/



===


🔌 What kind of plugin is it?


Scan Script is a plugin that recognizes the text in image data and outputs it as text data.


When working on design projects, you may receive instructions in the form of image data. And sometimes, you may want to use the text within the image directly, but find yourself unable to copy and paste it, leading to the need to manually type it and carefully double-check for any mistakes.

In such cases, this plugin can be used to convert image data into text data.



🔧 How to use


Select one image, press "Scan" and wait a moment for the text data within the image to be outputted.



⏱️ Recommended for times like these


You can convert image data into text data. No language selection is required, and the text recognition is highly accurate!


Please take advantage of this plugin to improve your work efficiency and create creative pieces. Feedback Flow is the 7th installment in the Plugin #100 Series provided by the deskwork brand 'NERY'!



📝 Please give us your feedback on the plugin features.


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 What is NERY?


NERY is a deskwork brand that develops and provides plugins for Figma and Chrome.



🚀 What is the Plugin #100 Series?


The Plugin #100 Series is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.


In this project, we will develop plugins that meet the needs of creators and support them to make design work more convenient and efficient.


We will not perform all the planning and development of the project, but by showing you the intermediate stages and receiving feedback, we will continue to improve the functionality of the plugins and develop new products.


Your feedback will be reflected in the development of the plugin, so we ask for your support to realize a more user-friendly and attractive Figma and Chrome.



🏢 Developer


Ajike Co., Ltd.

https://ajike.co.jp/

accepted.description:
NERY is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.
Please follow me.

plugins.tagline: Highly accurate text recognition. No need to select a language.

plugins.name: Multipaste
plugins.description:
Multipaste

🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿🇺🇸Multipaste is a Figma plugin that allows for copy and pasting elements to many frames at once. No more pasting frame-by-frame! Use this plugin to boost your workflow.

__

🇧🇷Multipaste é um plugin do Figma que permite copiar e colar elementos para vários frames de uma só vez. Chega de colar frame pro frame! Use esse plugin para acelerar seu trabalho.


Video demo: https://twitter.com/marceloblaz/status/1313321776865259520


Shortcut (for mac)

A simpler way to use plugins is by creating shortcuts. To create a shortcut, click on Figma at your system's navbar, then 'Services', 'Services Preferences', 'App shortcuts' and add a new shortcut for Figma. If you wish to use Multipaste with a shortcut, here is my suggested path:


For copying

Menu title: Plugins->Multipaste->Copy (⌃⌘C)


For pasting

Menu title: Plugins->Multipaste->Paste (⌃⌘V)


If you wish, you can also create a shortcut for clearing plugin cache by following the same procedure. Just switch the command and choose a shortcut.



What can this plugin do?

  • Copying multiple nodes, either nested in frames or in the page itself, at once and then pasting all of them into multiple frames or groups at once;
  • If any of the copied nodes is a component, it will create an instance of it and paste the instance, not duplicate the component;
  • Nodes that were copied from another frame will maintain its position in the new frame;
  • Nodes that weren't in a frame when copied will be placed in the center of the frames they get pasted into (same behaviour Figma already implements for copy/pasting).
  • NEW Multiple users may use the plugin within the same file without worrying about crossing plugin data.



What can't this plugin do?

  • This plugin won't work properly if you delete a copied node before pasting it first. It will still work for nodes that weren't deleted though.
  • This plugin doesn't access your system's clipboard, so you may not use regular copy/pasting commands to make it work;
  • This plugin doesn't allow pasting across different files.


Give feedback: https://forms.gle/azUS6mqaBypTTQG99

accepted.name: Marcelo Brasileiro
accepted.description: I'm a UX designer with frontend coding skills. I'm interested in helping products become more usable, inclusive, desirable and intelligent.

plugins.name: Gradient Mapper
plugins.description:
Gradient Mapper is a powerful and easy-to-use Figma plugin that allows you to create and apply gradient maps to your designs. With Gradient Mapper, you can create stunning gradient map effect with a single click, and transform your designs in seconds. It can be used to create a variety of gradient map effects, from subtle and nuanced to bold and dramatic.


With Gradient Mapper, you can:


  • Create your own colors to create custom gradient maps
  • Or choose existing gradient map colors which are readily available on single click
  • Reverse gradient or choose random gradient from the inbuilt gradient list.
  • Get instant preview of the effect and then save it lastly.
  • Input color in Hex, RGB or HSL format, or pick using color picker.
  • It will create new image layer, so your original image layer remains preserved beneath new gradient map effect.


Gradient Mapper is the perfect plugin for designers of all levels who want to add gradient map effect to their work. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, Gradient Mapper makes it easy to create stunning and professional-looking gradient map effect.


Here are some of the benefits of using Gradient Mapper:


  1. Save time and effort: Gradient Mapper makes it easy to create and apply gradient map to your designs in seconds, without having to learn complex Photoshop techniques.
  2. Create stunning gradients: Gradient Mapper gives you complete control over the colors for your gradient maps, so you can create the perfect look for your designs.
  3. Be more creative: Gradient Mapper opens up a whole new world of creative possibilities for your designs. With gradient maps, you can create a variety of effects, from subtle and nuanced to bold and dramatic.
  4. Improve your workflow: Gradient Mapper is fully integrated with Figma, so you can work on your designs and add gradient maps without having to switch between different applications.


If you're looking for a powerful and easy-to-use Figma gradient map plugin, then Gradient Mapper is the perfect choice for you.
plugins.tagline: The easiest way to add gradient maps to your Figma designs.

plugins.name: KSP Font Generator
plugins.description:
A simple, lightweight utility for generating bitmap fonts for Kontakt. 

This plugin converts any text object into a Kontakt-compatible font strip which retains most* of the font settings from the original text object (*see caveats below).


This plugin improves upon existing Kontakt font generation tools in a number of ways:

  • No need to manually upload font files or copy settings into an external tool. You can convert text elements directly from your interface design, without leaving Figma.
  • Because the font is generated by Figma’s rendering engine, the glyphs will look identical to any static text you are using in your design.
  • The plugin detects the true bounds of each rendered character, and prevents pixels from neighbouring characters from overlapping (common problem with some of the existing tools).


This is an essential tool for anyone using Figma for Kontakt GUI designs. Enjoy!



How To Use


Right click on any text object in your Figma document, and select Plugins > KSP Font Generator > Generate Font.

A new frame will be created, containing the generated font spritesheet in vector format. The generated font will retain any text styles applied to the original text object.

Finally, export the frame as a PNG, and it will be ready to use in Kontakt. 



Supported text properties


  • Typeface
  • Font size 
  • Font weight (bold, italic, etc.)
  • Character spacing
  • Underline and strikethrough 
  • Lettercase
  • Fill colour
  • Opacity
  • Inner shadow



Unsupported features and caveats


Due to the nature of bitmap fonts and how Kontakt handles them, there are a few caveats you should be aware of. 

  • Kontakt doesn’t support kerning pairs. This means that certain character sequences might look unusually spaced (especially characters with parallel diagonal lines that usually overlap, like ‘AV’). Unless Kontakt supports kerning pairs in the future, there’s nothing that can be done about this. 
  • The plugin will clamp the position of each character to prevent overlapping. This will come into effect when choosing a font size or spacing value which would usually cause overlapping characters. A warning will be displayed when this occurs.
  • Any text effects which would cause character bounds to overlap are unsupported. This includes blur, drop shadows and strokes. We may add support for these in the future, although using these features would force the minimum character spacing to increase.
  • Gradient fills are unsupported.
  • Other text properties such as line and paragraph spacing would have no effect because custom fonts can only be used on single-line labels.

accepted.name: Fracture Sounds

28571.name: KSP Font Generator
28571.description:
A simple, lightweight utility for generating bitmap fonts for Kontakt. 

This plugin converts any text object into a Kontakt-compatible font strip which retains most* of the font settings from the original text object (*see caveats below).


This plugin improves upon existing Kontakt font generation tools in a number of ways:

  • No need to manually upload font files or copy settings into an external tool. You can convert text elements directly from your interface design, without leaving Figma.
  • Because the font is generated by Figma’s rendering engine, the glyphs will look identical to any static text you are using in your design.
  • The plugin detects the true bounds of each rendered character, and prevents pixels from neighbouring characters from overlapping (common problem with some of the existing tools).


This is an essential tool for anyone using Figma for Kontakt GUI designs. Enjoy!



How To Use


Right click on any text object in your Figma document, and select Plugins > KSP Font Generator > Generate Font.

A new frame will be created, containing the generated font spritesheet in vector format. The generated font will retain any text styles applied to the original text object.

Finally, export the frame as a PNG, and it will be ready to use in Kontakt. 



Supported text properties


  • Typeface
  • Font size 
  • Font weight (bold, italic, etc.)
  • Character spacing
  • Underline and strikethrough 
  • Lettercase
  • Fill colour
  • Opacity
  • Inner shadow



Unsupported features and caveats


Due to the nature of bitmap fonts and how Kontakt handles them, there are a few caveats you should be aware of. 

  • Kontakt doesn’t support kerning pairs. This means that certain character sequences might look unusually spaced (especially characters with parallel diagonal lines that usually overlap, like ‘AV’). Unless Kontakt supports kerning pairs in the future, there’s nothing that can be done about this. 
  • The plugin will clamp the position of each character to prevent overlapping. This will come into effect when choosing a font size or spacing value which would usually cause overlapping characters. A warning will be displayed when this occurs.
  • Any text effects which would cause character bounds to overlap are unsupported. This includes blur, drop shadows and strokes. We may add support for these in the future, although using these features would force the minimum character spacing to increase.
  • Gradient fills are unsupported.
  • Other text properties such as line and paragraph spacing would have no effect because custom fonts can only be used on single-line labels.

plugins.name: Super Select
plugins.description:
Latest Version Changes:
- Select All Siblings and Invert Siblings support multiple layer selections (different groups)

SUPER SELECT: Multi-commands for layer selection!

*Select Parent*
Will deselect the selected layer and select its parent layer.

*Select Children*
Will deselect the selected layer and select all of its children.

*Select Intersecting*
Will select any layers intersecting with the current selected layer.

*Select Contained*
Will select any layers contained within the box of the current selected layer. Best used for rectangle backgrounds when desiring to selected visually contained layers as well.

Sibling Commands. These commands do not transcend the parent layer.

*Select All Siblings*
Selects all siblings layers. Note: This does not select the parent layer.

*Select Horizontal Siblings*
Selects any siblings to the visual right and left of the currently selected layer. Note: this does not transcend the parent layer.

*Select Vertical Siblings*
Selects any siblings to the visual top and bottom of the currently selected layer. Note: this does not transcend the parent layer.

*Select Inverse Siblings*
Inverts the layer selection. Note: this does not transcend the parent layer.

*Select Intersecting Siblings*
Will select any layers intersecting with the current selected layer. Note: this does not transcend the parent layer.

*Select Contained Siblings*
Will select any layers contained within the box of the current selected layer. Best used for rectangle backgrounds when desiring to selected visually contained layers as well. Note: this does not transcend the parent layer.

*REQUESTS / BUG REPORTS*
Email support or issue on github https://github.com/alexpineda/figma-super-select

*ROADMAP*
Not a lot planned. Investigating "Sibling - Select Similar" and see if there can be a usable approach to select similar layers.
Also curious about an options panel to toggle sibling constraint, as well as append to existing selection mode.

plugins.name: Fill Text with AI
plugins.description:
English version is below.



🔌 どんなプラグイン？


Fill Text with AIは、文章を出力したいシチュエーションを入力することで、AIがテキストを自動的に出力してくれるプラグインです。


Figmaでワイヤーフレームやデザインを作っているとき、コピーがまだ固まっていないからダミーテキストを入れたい瞬間があると思います。このプラグインを利用することで、AIが勝手に出力してくれるのでダミーテキストを考える手間が省けて、作業効率が大幅にアップします！



🎥 実際の使用例


下記の動画で、Fill Text with AIがどのように使用されているかをご確認いただけます。


https://youtu.be/dY_WEXQF-uw



🔧 使い方


Fill Text with AIは、文章を出力したいシチュエーションを入力し、生成ボタンを押すことでAIがテキストを自動的に出力してくれます。それをテキストオブジェクトに適用することができます。



⏱️ こんなときにおすすめ


このプラグインは、簡単な操作性とすばやい処理速度により、ダミーテキスト作成作業を効率的に行うことができます。ぜひ、このプラグインを使って作業効率をアップさせ、クリエイティブな作品を作り上げてください。


Fill Text with AIは、デスクワークブランドの「NERY」が提供するプラグイン#100シリーズ第三弾の作品になります！



📝 プラグイン機能のご要望・ご意見をお聞かせください


下記のリンクから、ご意見・ご要望をお聞かせください。


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 NERYとは？


NERYは、FigmaとChromeのプラグインを開発・提供するデスクワークブランドです。



🚀 プラグイン#100シリーズとは？


プラグイン#100シリーズは、FigmaとGoogle Chromeのユーザー向けに、100個のプラグインをリリースするプロジェクトです。


このプロジェクトでは、クリエイターのニーズに応じたプラグインを開発し、デザイン作業をより便利かつ効率的に行えるようにサポートします。


プロジェクトは、企画から開発まですべてを行うのではなく、途中段階のものを皆様にお見せし、フィードバックをいただくことで、プラグインの機能拡充や新たな製品開発につなげます。


皆様の声がプラグインの開発に反映されることで、より使いやすく、より魅力的なFigmaとChromeを実現するために、皆様のご支援をお願いいたします。



🏢 開発会社


株式会社アジケ

https://ajike.co.jp/



===


🔌 What kind of plugin is it?


Fill Text with AI is a plugin that automatically generates text by entering the situation in which you want to output a text and using AI.


When creating wireframes or designs in Figma, there are moments when you want to insert dummy text because the copy hasn't been finalized yet. By using this plugin, the AI automatically generates the text, saving you the hassle of thinking about dummy text and greatly increasing your work efficiency!



🎥 Actual usage examples


You can see how Fill Text with AI is being used in the video below.


https://youtu.be/dY_WEXQF-uw



🔧 How to use


Fill Text with AI automatically generates text by entering the situation in which you want to output a text and pressing the generate button. You can apply it to a text object.



⏱️ Recommended for times like these


This plugin allows you to efficiently create dummy text with its easy operability and fast processing speed. Please use this plugin to improve your work efficiency and create creative works.


Fill Text with AI is the third work in the "NERY" desk work brand's plugin #100 series!



📝 Please give us your plugin feature requests and feedback


Please let us know your opinions and requests from the link below.


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 What is NERY?


NERY is a deskwork brand that develops and provides plugins for Figma and Chrome.



🚀 What is the Plugin #100 Series?


The Plugin #100 Series is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.


In this project, we will develop plugins that meet the needs of creators and support them to make design work more convenient and efficient.


We will not perform all the planning and development of the project, but by showing you the intermediate stages and receiving feedback, we will continue to improve the functionality of the plugins and develop new products.


Your feedback will be reflected in the development of the plugin, so we ask for your support to realize a more user-friendly and attractive Figma and Chrome.



🏢 Developer


Ajike Co., Ltd.

https://ajike.co.jp/

accepted.description:
NERY is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.
Please follow me.

plugins.description:
Introducing Local Print, your go-to Figma Plugin for seamless documentation of design variables and styles! Elevate your workflow with features designed to streamline the documentation process and enhance collaboration:


  1. Effortless Selection: Choose specific collections for variable and style generation directly from Quick Actions, ensuring precision and customization tailored to your project's needs.
  2. Automated Frame Magic: Experience the convenience of automated frame generation, saving you valuable time and effort.
  3. Comprehensive Documentation: ”Local Print” provides clear and concise documentation for each variable type and style, empowering your team with valuable insights into your design system.
  4. Detail oriented: Seamlessly handle details, like opacities and descriptions with our plugin.
  5. Refresh: You can easily refresh your variables and styles by selecting the frame and pressing the refresh button at the bottom of the right sidebar or by running the plugin via the command.
  6. Theming: Choose between a light and a dark theme, when running your quick action.


How-to-use:

  1. install Plugin
  2. open Quick Action
  3. search Local Print
  4. choose your Collection
  5. lets go!


Local Print – the must-have Figma Plugin for designers who prioritize clarity, efficiency, and precision in their documentation.

plugins.name: Stepper Creator
plugins.description:
Stepper Creator is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the design process by generating customizable stepper interfaces with ease. It is ideal for designers and teams looking to add intuitive navigation elements to their UI/UX projects.


Key Features:

  1. Shape Selection: Choose between circle or square shapes for each step, allowing for versatile design alignment with your project's aesthetic.
  2. Spacing Between Steps: Manually add the spacing you want between each progress stepper
  3. Stepper Direction: Pick a direction for your stepper from vertical or horizontal, providing the flexibility to get creative
  4. Color Customization: Pick a color for your stepper elements, providing the flexibility to match your design palette.
  5. Step Count Flexibility: Select from a predefined range of steps for your stepper, making it suitable for various applications from simple to complex navigational sequences.


How to Use:

  1. Select the number of steps from the dropdown menu.
  2. Type the spacing you want between each progress stepper
  3. Choose a direction for the stepper - horizontal or vertical
  4. Choose the shape and color for your steps.
  5. Click 'Generate Stepper' to add the customized stepper to your Figma canvas.
  6. *Make sure to set the Auto Layout properties for each nested component to look and feel as desired (tweaking required)


Stay tuned for more customization options to come.


Your feedback is valuable to me, and hence I would appreciate if you can send me suggestions, bugs, and ideas on how can I make this plugin better for you.


Please reach out to me at: info@sonaliagrawal.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/sonaliagrawal

accepted.name: Sonali Agrawal
accepted.description: Design Systems | Product Designer | Mentor | Figma Fan | UX Strategist

plugins.name: QR Code Maker (free)
plugins.description:
Create a QR Code Maker in your Figma file in seconds :)


There's nothing fancy about this one: just enter the URL, choose your color (or colour 😉), and press the "Insert QR Code" button. But incase you're looking for more details:


👋🏻 First things first:

  1. 100% free: no payment or fees required
  2. All QR Codes are yours to use for any project (no licensing required)


🔗 URL Limitations:

  1. There are none: the URL can be as long as you want :)
  2. The longer the URL, the crazier your QR code will look


💁‍♀️ Colors:

  1. Easy 1-click (well, 2-clicks) to change the color of your QR Code
  2. Nothing more to say about this one.


🤔 More:

  1. Click: click on the "Insert QR Code" button, and that's it
  2. All QR Codes are added as the top most layer so you can easily find it
  3. All QR Codes are named with "QR Code Maker" and part of the URL (making it easier to find)


🔗 References:

  1. Thanks to Nimiq for open sourcing their QR Creator library: https://github.com/nimiq/qr-creator
  2. Here's more information on Nimiq: https://www.nimiq.com/


🛟 Feedback:

  1. We'd love any ideas or questions you have: feedback@berryplugins.com
  2. Leave a comment if you want to tell people how great this plugin is


🎉🎉🎉

113644.description:
Create a QR Code Maker in your Figma file in seconds :)


There's nothing fancy about this one: just enter the URL, choose your color (or colour 😉), and press the "Insert QR Code" button. But incase you're looking for more details:


👋🏻 First things first:

  1. 100% free: no payment or fees required
  2. All QR Codes are yours to use for any project (no licensing required)


🔗 URL Limitations:

  1. There are none: the URL can be as long as you want :)
  2. The longer the URL, the crazier your QR code will look


💁‍♀️ Colors:

  1. Easy 1-click (well, 2-clicks) to change the color of your QR Code
  2. Nothing more to say about this one.


🤔 More:

  1. Click: click on the "Insert QR Code" button, and that's it
  2. All QR Codes are added as the top most layer so you can easily find it
  3. All QR Codes are named with "QR Code Maker" and part of the URL (making it easier to find)


🔗 References:

  1. Thanks to Nimiq for open sourcing their QR Creator library: https://github.com/nimiq/qr-creator
  2. Here's more information on Nimiq: https://www.nimiq.com/


🛟 Feedback:

  1. We'd love any ideas or questions you have: feedback@berryplugins.com
  2. Leave a comment if you want to tell people how great this plugin is


🎉🎉🎉
113644.tagline: Make a QR code with just two clicks (or less). QR Code Maker is free and simple.

plugins.name: View Finder
plugins.description:
You can now design any viewport in the canvas and give it a name. and jump to it any time you want go to it

How it works

- Scroll and zoom to the view in the canvas you want to save in the plugin.

- In the bottom of the plugin window you will find "create view with name" field. Type the name of the view you want and click create.

- The view will be added in the plugin list.
When you want to jump to that view just click on the view you have create in the list.

The plugin works accross pages as well.

Don't forget to support the plugin ☕️

plugins.name: Quick New Page
plugins.description:
Super quick add new page and be more productive!


Quick New Page is your go-to tool for adding new pages to your design files. Whether you need to insert a one page or multiple pages, this plugin streamlines the process, saving you time and letting you focus on your creative work.


Looking for a plugin that can create and manage multiple page? Try Page Automator

plugins.name: Yellowstone — plugin for themes
plugins.description:
Create, switch and manage as many themes as you need.

Global themes supported, with no need to login anywhere.

Export CSS-variables from theme.

Update all styles within theme at once using Palettes.


Learn how to use this plugin with this Figma Yellowstone Playground


Switch themes 🌞🌛

Plugin switches all colors and effects within selection.

Works for texts with multiple styles.


Create new themes — as much as you need 👨‍🎨👩‍🎨

Duplicate existing theme to create new in just one click. No need to create new styles manually.


Manage themes: rename, update, delete 🧰🎨

Update themes using Palettes: draw theme’s Palette, change its colors and effects and update entire theme. Try this Figma Yellowstone Playground to learn how to use it.


Use global themes 📖

Save your library’s themes within plugin, load it in another figma file and use. That easy. No need to login anywhere, no need to create any external files or smth.


Export CSS-variables from theme 📤

Put css-variables in styles Description once and get ready-to-go code in one click, with any update of your theme.


---


What it does with Local Styles 💡

Plugin puts square brackets in style name, to define what theme it belongs to. For example: [Light] / card, [Dark] / card or [Gray] / card.


Of course you can put brackets manually, anywhere, there's no limits: Card [Light], Card / bg [Light], Card [Light] / bg, [Light] / bg — its all good. Also, plugin will keep your syntax renaming themes and creating new ones.
